text: Hienadz Buraukin (, August 28, 1936 â€“ May 30, 2014) was a Belarusian poet, journalist and diplomat. He served as an Ambassador to the United Nations for Belarus. Buraukin died from cancer on May 30, 2014 in Minsk at the age of 77.Henadz Buraukin dies ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Ambassadors to the United Nations Category:Belarusian poets Category:Belarusian journalists Category:People from Vitebsk Region
